experiences.description: It was an informal group of developers, where we worked together on various freelance projects, mostly using LAMP stack and lately MERN stack.
Worked on SmartCovr a Insurance SASS platform using React, Rematch, feathers client, and JSON schema forms for managing dynamic forms.

projects.name: MVNA
projects.description:
The Med-Vet-Net Association is a network of excellence that aims to pool expertise in veterinary science, in order to strengthen the prevention and control of zoonoses.

The application has dynamic content, and a full page WYSIWIG editor to live edit the UI design using grape js.

projects.name: Cohesive
projects.description:
It is part of the One Health European Joint Programme.

It provides guidance on setting up a One Health Risk Analysis System for zoonoses for your country.

The application has dynamic content, and a full page WYSIWIG editor to live edit the UI design using grape js.

projects.name: Meme Creator
projects.description: It is an application for creating memes. It has different templates and Editing tools.

projects.name: Technically Sorted
projects.description:
It is a web application for course listing for an Individual, related to financial market trading.

Project contains various dynamic pages which can be managed through Admin Dashboard.

projects.name: Eurasia Education Link
projects.description:
It is a web application for managing education consultancy service.

It is a complete onestop CMS with various roles and permissions

projects.name: The Rainbow Creations
projects.description:
It is an event management company based in New Delhi and Varanasi.

The website has Services listing and Gallery for the events hosted.

projects.name: Khidmaah Foundation
projects.description: It is an NGO for providing charity food to the needy people within Mumbai.
